member.name: WS_OPERATION_CONTEXT_PROPERTY_ID
member.summary: The properties available on the Context. Not all properties may be available at a given point on a context. All context properties are available through .

member.name: WS_OPERATION_CONTEXT_PROPERTY_ID.WS_OPERATION_CONTEXT_PROPERTY_CHANNEL
member.summary: This value is a handle to the underlying channel. This property is available to service operations , to the WS_SERVICE_MESSAGE_RECEIVE_CALLBACK, WS_SERVICE_ACCEPT_CHANNEL_CALLBACK andWS_SERVICE_CLOSE_CHANNEL_CALLBACK.

member.name: WS_OPERATION_CONTEXT_PROPERTY_ID.WS_OPERATION_CONTEXT_PROPERTY_CONTRACT_DESCRIPTION
member.summary: The value represents the contract description. This property is available to service operations , to the WS_SERVICE_MESSAGE_RECEIVE_CALLBACK, WS_SERVICE_ACCEPT_CHANNEL_CALLBACK andWS_SERVICE_CLOSE_CHANNEL_CALLBACK.

member.name: WS_OPERATION_CONTEXT_PROPERTY_ID.WS_OPERATION_CONTEXT_PROPERTY_HOST_USER_STATE
member.summary: The value is a pointer to the host state specified on the service host as the service property. This property is available to service operations and to the WS_SERVICE_MESSAGE_RECEIVE_CALLBACK.

member.name: WS_OPERATION_CONTEXT_PROPERTY_ID.WS_OPERATION_CONTEXT_PROPERTY_CHANNEL_USER_STATE
member.summary: The value is a pointer to the channel state specified through WS_SERVICE_ACCEPT_CHANNEL_CALLBACK. This property is available to service operations and to the WS_SERVICE_MESSAGE_RECEIVE_CALLBACK.

member.name: WS_OPERATION_CONTEXT_PROPERTY_ID.WS_OPERATION_CONTEXT_PROPERTY_INPUT_MESSAGE
member.summary: The value is a pointer to the underlying input message. This property is available to service operations and to theWS_SERVICE_MESSAGE_RECEIVE_CALLBACK.

member.name: WS_OPERATION_CONTEXT_PROPERTY_ID.WS_OPERATION_CONTEXT_PROPERTY_OUTPUT_MESSAGE
member.summary: The value is a pointer to the underlying output message. This property is available only to service operations.

member.name: WS_OPERATION_CONTEXT_PROPERTY_ID.WS_OPERATION_CONTEXT_PROPERTY_HEAP
member.summary: The value is a pointer to the WS_HEAP. This property is available to a service operation. Please see the memory management section in service operations for usage.
